title: Cartography in Haskell
description: Introduction This blog started off life as a blog post on how I use nix but somehow transformed itself into a “how I do data visualisation” blog post. The nix is still here though quietly doing its work in the background. Suppose you want to analyze your local election results and visualize them using a …

title: Ember 2018 Priorities
description: We need to ship what we started and let our newer contributors shine and lead.
